directions: Brown beef in large nonstick skillet; drain fat.* Add tomatoes and Recipe Ready Mirepoix and bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce heat to low and simmer 10 minutes. Stir in parsley and salt.
Turn mixture into 1-1/2 quart casserole dish. Evenly top with mashed potatoes.
Bake 20 minutes or until potatoes are golden and mixture is bubbling.
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) bag Birds Eye® Recipe Ready Mirepoix
1 (24 ounce) container refrigerated prepared mashed potatoes
title: Shepherd's Pie from Birds Eye®
